name: TV Show King
description:
Confront friends and family in a TV quiz game show! Try to answer fun and challenging trivia questions, from the classics to original stumpers, spanning history, geography, literature, science, sports, and entertainment! Make it to the finals and see who can win the greatest amount of cash in one final, deciding duel. TV Show King will challenge your brain!

- Have fun and test your general knowledge with more than 7,000 questions on all kinds of subjects for a game that's both serious and hilarious.
- Numerous entertaining themes including music, cinema, entertainment, history, geography, sports, common knowledge, fun, and pop culture.
- Unique multiplayer modes with real-time quizzes: play online with players all over the world or with your friends and upload your scores to see who's the best!
- Turn the wheel to spice up the game: double your winnings, lose everything, or swap your cash!
- Tensions rise with increasing difficulty and higher stakes!

Text on screen is in English.
